post_message: BREAKING: A 30-year-old man Newhall man has been charged with sexual assault and murder in the death of his 19-day-old infant daughter. Matthew Brendan Warner led investigators to the baby body less than 12 hours after the infant had been reported missing over the weekend. He was arrested on suspicion of murder. On Tuesday, prosecutors announced he had been charged with aggravated sexual assault, torture and other alleged crimes. Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
